name: PointNXT
author: AdaptNXT

sections.description:
You can process orders on Shopify, WooCommerce, Etsy, Amazon, Flipkart and other channels with PointNXT, a multichannel order processing and fulfillment solution for WooCommerce. PointNXT automatically adjusts & syncs inventory to avoid overselling of products. Powerful features and automation are available in PointNXT’s user-friendly, intuitive interface, making it simple to process orders on many marketplaces with just one tool.

Multichannel supported: Shopify, WooCommerce, Facebook, Google Shopping, Etsy, Amazon, eBay, Walmart, Flipkart.

With PointNXT and WooCommerce integration, your orders on WooCommerce are automatically imported into PointNXT for further processing and fulfillment.

WooCommerce integration in a few clicks

The Plugin:

  • Automatically looks to see if you have WooCommerce installed on your page and allows you to reconnect if already installed.
  • Automatically creates the correct API keys so you don’t have to (no more copy and pasting!)
  • Sends the right information to PointNXT to help sync your prices, inventory stock levels and more!

short_description: Helps you easily integrate your WooCommerce store with PointNXT.
